original.sQuestion: A group of farmers planned to clean 80 acres of wheat per day to finish the work on schedule . Right before the work started , they received a new piece of machinery that helped them clean 10 more acres per day than originally planned . As a result of increased productivity in the last day before the deadline they only had to clean 30 acres . How many acres of wheat did the group of farmers have to clean ?
